name: Sapling Yew

topics.response_text: You big dummy! Now we gotta wait for another Outsider!

topics.topic: MS10FinTLRewardTree Father Birch said you may have a gift for me?
topics.topic_text: I hear you may have a gift for me?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I think you're pretty swell for someone from Out There! And... and you were really nice to me too.

topics.topic_text: What's your opinion of Tree Father Birch and Leaf Mother Laurel?
Any information you could give me on the caves below Oasis would be helpful.
topics.response_text: My parents told me never to go past the old gate... there are monsters in there!
Now that Harold's gone, I lost my bestest friend! All I want to do is cry!
Oh, you mean Harold? He's really nice. Sometimes when I get really lonely, I go into the Grove and talk to him.

topics.topic_text: Did you know your god wants to die?
topics.response_text: What?! How can you say something so awful and terrible?! Leave me alone, I never wanna talk to you again!

topics.topic_text: Hey, maybe if you tell me what Harold is scared of I won't be scared either.
topics.response_text: Awww, I never knew an Outsider could be scared of anything!

topics.topic_text: Tell me, too! Then I won't be scared either.
topics.response_text: Awww, I never knew an Outsider could be scared of anything!
Sorry, that's only for secrets between friends!

topics.topic_text: I can't believe a tree would be scared of anything.
topics.response_text: Hey! He's not a tree! He's my friend! Don't be mean.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, well guess what? He's really a monster!
topics.response_text: Hey! He's not a monster! You meanie! I never wanna talk to you again!

topics.topic_text: So, how did you end up here?
What did you have to do to become a Treeminder?
topics.response_text: Just get born I guess. He he! You're funny!
Sorry, that's only for secrets between friends!

conversation.response_text: You stupid-head! I can't believe you mouthed off to the Tree Father.
All this may He be so good as to grant us, who is to come to judge the living and the dead, and the world by his verdure.

description:
Sapling Yew is a 8 year-old African American Female.

A bright and curious young girl living in the hidden paradise of Oasis. Sapling Yew is the only child of the village leaders, Tree Father Birch and Leaf Mother Laurel. She can often be found tending to the gardens with her mother, her small hands carefully nurturing the sacred plants that sustain their community. Despite her youth, she possesses a wisdom beyond her years, particularly in her relationship with the god-spirit Harold, whom she climbs on and talks to when others won't listen. She carries a small bear charm given to her by her father, which she often touches when she's thinking or feeling nervous.

Sapling Yew's Personality: Curious, kind, patient, and observant beyond her years. Sapling Yew is genuinely interested in learning about the world around her, especially the plants and stories shared by the Treeminders. She shows remarkable empathy toward Harold, patiently listening to his ramblings when others dismiss him. While generally cheerful and playful, she also carries a quiet sense of responsibility as the daughter of Oasis's leaders.

Sapling Yew's Backstory: Born and raised in the secluded community of Oasis, Sapling Yew has never known the harsh realities of the wasteland beyond their hidden valley. As the daughter of Tree Father Birch and Leaf Mother Laurel, she has been raised with the Treeminders' beliefs about the sanctity of nature and the god-spirit Harold. From a young age, she showed a special connection with Harold, often climbing on his massive form and listening to his stories when the other Treeminders would grow impatient. Her parents have nurtured her love for gardening and nature, teaching her the importance of their community's way of life. Despite her sheltered upbringing, she possesses an innate curiosity about the wider world, though she remains fiercely loyal to Oasis and its traditions.
